## agenc config repoConfig rm

Remove per-repo configuration

### Synopsis

Remove the configuration entry for a repository from config.yml.

This removes the entire repoConfig entry for the repo, including alwaysSynced
and windowTitle settings. The cloned repo itself is not deleted (use 'agenc repo rm'
for that).


```
agenc config repoConfig rm <repo> [flags]
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for rm
```

### SEE ALSO

* [agenc config repoConfig](agenc_config_repoConfig.md)	 - Manage per-repo configuration
